attributes.action: London voted to remain In the EU. Pls Make London Independent from the UK.
attributes.background: Everyboy knows what is happening right now about Britain leaving the EU. It's not fair to get removed while we, Londoners and British, wanted to remain in the EU. So, I am here to turn things around. London should be independent and break free from the Uk. Come on Mayor....

rejection.details: This petition is addressed to the Mayor of London. The UK Government and Parliament Petitions website can only be used for petitions that are addressed to central government or Parliament.
